original_text: And the people shall take them, and bring them to their place: and the house of Israel shall possess them in the land of the Lord for servants and handmaids: and they shall take them captives, whose captives they were; and they shall rule over their oppressors.
korean_text: 민족들이 그들을 데리고 그들의 본토에 돌아오리니 이스라엘 족속이 여호와의 땅에서 그들을 얻어 노비로 삼겠고 전에 자기를 사로잡던 자들을 사로잡고 자기를 압제하던 자들을 주관하리라

sentences.original_text: And the people shall take them
and bring them to their place
and the house of Israel shall possess them
in the land of the Lord
and they shall take them captives
and they shall rule over their oppressors
